snippet.title: Five Nights at Freddy’s: Help Wanted 2 & Security Breach - Ruin – Nintendo Direct: Partner Showcase
snippet.description:
Get ready to clock in, because Five Nights at Freddy's: Help Wanted 2 and Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach - Ruin are coming to Nintendo Switch this holiday season. 
 
Can YOU survive your first nights on the job? Find out as you join Freddy Fazbear and the gang for some spine-chilling  shifts. Explore locations both familiar and unfamiliar, play minigames, but be warned: the animatronics tend to get a bit quirky at night. 

Gregory is once again trapped in the now abandoned Pizzaplex, and he needs your help! Join Cassie, Gregory’s best friend, Faz-fanatic, and would-be savior as she braves the  dilapidated ruins of the pizzeria she knew and loved. Armed with only a Faz-Wrench, a Roxy-Talky, and this weird bunny mask, it's up to you  to help Cassie find her friend, free him, and safely escape the ruins.

#FNAF #NintendoDirect #NintendoSwitch

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://www.nintendo.com/us/

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nintendoamerica
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nintendo
